Author: Gudipoodi Srihari
Description: Gayatri Kondepudi, a student of Bharatanatyam guru Hemamalini Arni and presented a Bharatanatyam recital. Gayatri revealed right in her first number Vatapi Ganapathim Bhaje her grip on the art. Though
